main_definition: The most intense or extreme in heat, popularity, interest, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Most hot to the touch or temperature-wise
meanings_and_examples.example: This coffee is the hottest thing I've ever sipped!

meanings_and_examples.definition: The most popular, trendiest, or in demand item or topic
meanings_and_examples.example: Skateboarding shoes are currently considered one of the hottest fashion trends.
He is known as the hottest musician in town, with fans lining up for his concerts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The most active or energetic part of an event (like a party)
meanings_and_examples.example: The hottest part of the night was when everyone decided to dance together!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference used to indicate someone's attractiveness, often in a humorous way
meanings_and_examples.example: He's not bad looking; he could be considered one of the hottest guys at the party.
